snippet: A federal judge will begin hearing arguments for and against the proposed deal on Wednesday.
abstract: Federal Judge Anita B Brody will hear arguments regarding proposed settlement of lawsuit in which retired players allege NFL hid dangers of concussions; core of opposition to settlement is limited coverage of chronic traumatic encephalopathy, degenerative neurological disease that has definitively been diagnosed only in autopsies.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge will begin hearing arguments for and against the proposed deal on Wednesday.

headline.main: Opposition to N.F.L. Settlement Centers on Coverage for Neurological Disease
headline.print_headline: Opposition to N.F.L. Settlement Centers on Coverage for Neurological Disease
